jobDescription: This Digital Asset Specialist Position Features:• Fantastic and Cohesive Work Environment Full Benefits Package401KGreat Pay to $60K Do you love analyzing data and finding it's correlation to trends and their cause? This might be the job for you! This prestigious insurance company in the Los Angeles area is actively seeking a Digital Asset Specialist with prior insurance experience. This role will be responsible for analyzing multiple data pools and providing reports based on findings, coordinate with technology vendors and perform training on new system updates.  This company values their employees and strives to maintain a cohesive work environment that people want to come to each day. In addition, this role comes with fantastic compensation, full benefits and a 401k option. This is a great opportunity to grow in your career with a great organization. If it all sounds like a fit, apply for this great opportunity today!
